__e: Don't disrespect her. When we're on the grift, our lives are in each other's hands.
You will sit there and I will keep sitting here for we must not even touch our hands.
No matter what happens, we must not let go of each other's hands.
When the time comes, we'll have the strength to live each other's lives.
It's funny how people come in and out of each others' lives.
I mean, it was so much easier to be in each other's lives when we were underneath the same roof.
When you find each other, you run into each other's arms.

The only rest we'll find is in each other's arms.

but because we rest in each other's company.
